entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 8:05 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:05 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
